content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Novartis is a global healthcare company based in Switzerland that provides solutions to address the evolving needs of patients worldwide. It was created in 1996 through a merger of Ciba-Geigy and Sandoz. Novartis and its predecessor companies trace roots back more than 250 years, with a rich history of developing innovative products.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":1211875,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/530e17d3-5647-4871-ae4e-03d0dd292899/Novartis.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/530e17d3-5647-4871-ae4e-03d0dd292899/Novartis.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Novartis.PNG\",\"name\":\"Novartis.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"530e17d3-5647-4871-ae4e-03d0dd292899\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":572.4662004662005},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Operation is the cross-divisional Novartis-internal service organization with > 10'000 associates and a cost base of > 5 bn USD. NBS was put in place early 2015 to provide services to: IT, Procurement, Real Estate, PLS, HR
